import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add a post comment"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/community/blog/{postid}/comment"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds a comment to the post with the ID specified in the request. The parent comment ID can be also specified if needed.

**Note**: Send parentId=00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 or don't send it at all if you want your comment to be on the root level.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"postid","in":"path","description":"Post ID","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"content":{"description":"Comment text","type":"string"},"parentId":{"description":"Parent comment ID","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of post comments","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"Text":{"type":"string","example":"comment text"},"Created":{"type":"string","example":"2020-12-03T21:36:13.0325127Z"},"Updated":{"type":"string","example":"c2020-12-03T21:36:13.0325127Z"},"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"c2020-12-03T21:36:13.0325127Z"},"CreatedBy":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"},"DisplayName":{"type":"string","example":"Mike Zanyatski"},"Title":{"type":"string","example":"Manager"},"AvatarSmall":{"type":"string","example":"url to small avatar"},"ProfileUrl":{"type":"string","example":"\\/Products\\/People\\/Profile.aspx?user=administrator"}},"title":"EmployeeWraper"}},"title":"BlogPostCommentWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
